briefTitle: A Study of Aripiprazole Lauroxil or Paliperidone Palmitate for the Treatment of Schizophrenia
officialTitle: A Phase 3b, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Aripiprazole Lauroxil or Paliperidone Palmitate for the Treatment of Schizophrenia in Subjects Hospitalized for Acute Exacerbation
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy of initiating treatment of schizophrenia with ARISTADA INITIO plus 30 mg oral aripiprazole followed by a 2-month dose of AL.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Positive and Negative Syndrome Scale (PANSS) Total Score at Week 4
